text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The racers up front set a brutally high<n>pace. There was
seemingly little hope<n>of catching up, but then... Narita Brian<n>
overtook them all and seized the win!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Not only was it a Satsuki Sho record,<n>she set a new top time
for the<n>2,000-meter Nakayama track!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
What a heart-pounding race! The<n>thunder of applause from
the stands<n>won't stop!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Wha... What was that explosion on<n>the final stretch?!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
This is a G1 race, but those other<n>racers looked like
toddlers! I had no<n>idea Narita Brian was so good!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
She gets a landslide three-length lead,<n>with a course record
to boot. And yet<n>she stands there, looking<n>disappointed
the race ended so soon.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Brian... Even on the track, you're<n>still my greedy little
sister.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The Classics are prestigious races asit is—and that win wasphenomenal.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It cemented Narita Brian's reputation:<n>she's the best racer
of the generation.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Exhale...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hup!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Whoo, Brian's outta this world...<n>Every single lap is a new
personal<n>best.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I know she ran an amazing race in<n>the Satsuki Sho, but who
would've<n>thought she had this much more<n>potential?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Look at that—even the onlookers are<n>standing there
dumbstruck.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
She shoots past our expectations<n>every run. I've had to
revamp her<n>training routine over and over.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmph...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Nice going, Brian. You're getting<n>comfortable with that
running style.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Low center of gravity, right? I heard<n>you two created it
together when you<n>scouted her.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I gave some advice, but Brian's the<n>one who made it work.
I was blown<n>away the first time I saw it.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I gave some advice, but Brian's the<n>one who made it work.
I was blown<n>away the first time I saw it.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: All right, let's finish off with one more<n>lap.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Just one? Then I'll take it seriously.<n>Get that stopwatch
ready.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Say what? You weren't serious this<n>whole time?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ...You may need to rework that<n>training routine again.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Looks like it...

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, Brian! Do you have time<n>for a quick question?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Whoa, what the heck?! We're in the<n>middle of training here!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
I'm so sorry to interrupt, but I<n>couldn't get a hold of Narita
Brian<n>anywhere else. This is the only<n>chance I've got!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
If it means that much to you... I've got<n>you covered! What's
your question?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...I'll let you handle it. I'm off.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Aaah, wait! Just one thing!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
You ran a beautiful race at the Satsuki<n>Sho, but what's next
for you? Will you<n>try to become the fifth ever Triple<n>Crown
champion?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...They're all just stepping stones.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Stepping stones? H-hey, what exactly<n>do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Exactly as she said.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Winning the Triple Crown is not<n>enough to satisfy her
hunger.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I thought I'd find you here.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
There's a flood of reporters down at<n>the training grounds,
trying to find you<n>for an interview.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Oh, hey Sis...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
At the Satsuki Sho... the leaders set a<n>breakneck pace from
the start.<n>Usually, everyone would be worn out<n>by the final
straight.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Nevertheless, you met the challenge,<n>and when everyone
else ran out of<n>steam, you shot through to victory.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It's no wonder you've thrown<n>everyone into an uproar.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I didn't mean to do anything special.<n>It didn't feel
particularly fast to me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I know all too well there are racers<n>out there who could've
run faster.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You've caused quite a stir in the<n>racing world with your
astounding win,<n>but you still don't seem happy.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I wonder when exactly that appetite<n>of yours will be sated.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I suggest you use the back entrance<n>to the dorms. There
aren't any<n>reporters on that side.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You've found yourself a good<n>team—your wins are proof of
that. I'll<n>be watching what you do next.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
When will my appetite be sated? You<n>should know that
better than anyone<n>else.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It'll be the day I beat you.
